name: TrueVault
headline: We make Privacy Software for SMBs.
description: TrueVault builds software tools that help businesses comply with consumer data privacy laws. We believe if businesses have access to products that make getting and staying compliant simple, straightforward, and fully automated, respecting consumers' data privacy becomes the sensible default. And we all benefit from that.

founders.name: Jason Wang, Founder
founders.description: Founder of @truevault • Employee #1 at @scorebig • Worked at @razorfish • Studied at @uc Irvine.

## Privacy laws are sweeping across the US with 19 States & counting. And noncompliance is an expensive gamble
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/669405647d49ced90c71a31d_Frame%2020845.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/66a977920d7a45c6692ec587_Frame%20427321053.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6694056494fc13dcc448ee94_Frame%2020843.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/66a9778b84fb661d946fa448_Frame%20427321054.jpg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/669150af421e97bbe6b82e6a_Frame%2020842.jpg)
## Your data footprint is vast & complex and you're probably missing a lot. You need a privacy program
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/66940671618824756643e508_megaphone.svg)
Inform Users
Consumers need to be fully & accurately informed on how you use their data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/669406714a1b7b5226e9c147_user-round-check.svg)
Get Consent
You might be collecting the wrong type of consent & misusing data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/669406717c2f38db0bf93947_clock-10.svg)
On-Time Requests
Every privacy law imposes timelines for request handling
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6694067114cf910b928d5473_scan-eye.svg)
Vendor Oversight
You might lack required privacy language in your vendor contracts, exposing you to risks
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/669ad0178c091b030fd0d0d5_Frame%2020847.png)
## Enter TrueVault
You don’t have to be a privacy expert to get compliant. Truevault is a single solution that handles all your privacy needs.
Hosted Privacy Center
A managed hub for consumers to learn about your privacy practices and exercise their rights
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/669c256563bfa4c0c5323535_wide.png)
Request Handling
Track, manage, and automate privacy requests from one dashboard
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/669c22d7dd02ee5e3df16054_narrow.png)
Ready-Made Notices
Flexible privacy notices to match your business requirements
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/669ef2f295e276b0d12e59bb_narrow%20\(1\).png)
Vendor Privacy Monitoring
Not sure what kind of data your vendors process? Our research tracks 2,500+ suppliers to know how they treat customer data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/669ef43e8977e4643823ed55_wide%20\(2\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6691597177dda8b97189491d_Frame%2020842.svg)
## Automatically up-to-date with the latest privacy laws
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6691597177dda8b97189491d_Frame%2020842.svg)

## Have Questions? We've got answers.
How is TrueVault different from other privacy solutions?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
Law firms can help businesses create a data map and identify compliance issues; they’re also slow, expensive, require a new consultation every time the laws change, and typically don’t provide much help with request handling. On the other hand, most SaaS privacy solutions focus primarily on automated request handling and leave businesses on their own to figure out everything else. TrueVault starts at the beginning, guiding businesses through all stages of compliance. You can create your business’s data map, post privacy notices, provider consumer opt-outs, and more, all without hiring an attorney. Vendor integrations and automated workflows make request-handling fast and simple.
Does TrueVault replace the need for a lawyer?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
TrueVault was designed by attorneys to help businesses of all sizes navigate privacy compliance without needing to hire a law firm. We endeavor to provide the information and context necessary for businesses to make smart decisions about privacy, but TrueVault is not a substitute for legal advice from a qualified attorney. Our product is used and loved by business leaders with diverse backgrounds, including in-house general counsels who use it to fill gaps in their privacy knowledge and technical capabilities.
Does TrueVault have DSAR automation?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
Our platform uses automation to help your team easily handle consumer privacy requests. For example, through our platform, opt-outs on your website occur automatically through our Google Analytics integration, and data deletion requests are processed automatically through our GA connection. We also have integrations with key vendors like Shopify. Contact our team at help@truevault.com if you have any questions about specific vendors you work with.
Can TrueVault track website visitor consent?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
Yes! TrueVault offers a consent management platform (CMP) to track cookie consent and more. While opt-in consent is not required for most data processing under US state privacy laws, TrueVault customers still have access to a robust set of customizable consent management tools if they want to implement them.
Which privacy laws does TrueVault cover?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
You can view a current list of privacy laws covered by TrueVault [here](https://www.truevault.com/<https:/www.truevault.com/privacy-laws-covered-by-truevault-products>). Please note that the laws covered may vary according to the terms of your subscription.
How long does it take to get compliant with TrueVault?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
Every business is different, but many TrueVault customers are able to launch their privacy center to their website and be ready to handle privacy requests in 1–2 business days.

## Have Questions? We've got answers.
How is TrueVault different from other privacy solutions?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
Law firms can help businesses create a data map and identify compliance issues; they’re also slow, expensive, require a new consultation every time the laws change, and typically don’t provide much help with request handling. On the other hand, most SaaS privacy solutions focus primarily on automated request handling and leave businesses on their own to figure out everything else. TrueVault starts at the beginning, guiding businesses through all stages of compliance. You can create your business’s data map, post privacy notices, provider consumer opt-outs, and more, all without hiring an attorney. Vendor integrations and automated workflows make request-handling fast and simple.
Does TrueVault replace the need for a lawyer?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
TrueVault was designed by attorneys to help businesses of all sizes navigate privacy compliance without needing to hire a law firm. We endeavor to provide the information and context necessary for businesses to make smart decisions about privacy, but TrueVault is not a substitute for legal advice from a qualified attorney. Our product is used and loved by business leaders with diverse backgrounds, including in-house general counsels who use it to fill gaps in their privacy knowledge and technical capabilities.
Does TrueVault have DSAR automation?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
Our platform uses automation to help your team easily handle consumer privacy requests. For example, through our platform, opt-outs on your website occur automatically through our Google Analytics integration, and data deletion requests are processed automatically through our GA connection. We also have integrations with key vendors like Shopify. Contact our team at help@truevault.com if you have any questions about specific vendors you work with.
Can TrueVault track website visitor consent?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
Yes! TrueVault offers a consent management platform (CMP) to track cookie consent and more. While opt-in consent is not required for most data processing under US state privacy laws, TrueVault customers still have access to a robust set of customizable consent management tools if they want to implement them.
Which privacy laws does TrueVault cover?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
You can view a current list of privacy laws covered by TrueVault here⟨41⟩. Please note that the laws covered may vary according to the terms of your subscription.
How long does it take to get compliant with TrueVault?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666211c512ed2a3e157e5f25/6692ef535cf5dc1ccebc7a04_666211c512ed2a3e157e6004_Plus%20Icon%201.svg)
Every business is different, but many TrueVault customers are able to launch their privacy center to their website and be ready to handle privacy requests in 1–2 business days.

### TrueVault: Simplifying Privacy Compliance for SMBs

**Mission**  
TrueVault is on a mission to provide robust privacy software tailored specifically for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs). Their core belief is straightforward: if businesses have access to efficient compliance tools, protecting consumer data becomes the easy and obvious choice.

**Overview**  
Founded in 2013 and emerging from Y Combinator’s W14 batch, TrueVault operates from the heart of San Francisco. The platform aims to streamline compliance with complex consumer data privacy laws across various jurisdictions, making it accessible even for companies without extensive legal resources.

**What They Do**  
TrueVault's comprehensive privacy platform does the heavy lifting for companies grappling with compliance requirements. The software is designed to handle all aspects of privacy management:

- **Easy Onboarding**: Businesses can get started quickly, often going live in just two days.
- **Automated Compliance**: It continuously updates to reflect the latest privacy laws, so businesses don't have to worry about falling behind.
- **Consumer Interaction**: Offers a dedicated privacy center for consumers to understand how their data is used and to exercise their rights.
- **Request Management**: Streamlines the handling of consumers' privacy requests through an intuitive dashboard.
- **Vendor Oversight**: Monitors how third-party vendors manage customer data, a growing concern in the privacy landscape.

**Key Features**  
The platform is built by experienced attorneys, offering features that include:
- Compliance automation tools
- Ready-to-use privacy notices tailored to various business models
- Integration capabilities with popular platforms like Shopify and Google Analytics
- An industry-leading compliance guarantee where TrueVault will cover fines up to $250,000 if customers become non-compliant while using their service.

**Current Climate**  
With 19 states and counting enacting new privacy laws, the demand for solutions like TrueVault has skyrocketed. Non-compliance can lead to significant fines, making it less of a risk and more of a necessity for businesses to adopt such tools. TrueVault positions itself as a single source of truth for businesses to manage their privacy needs efficiently.

**User Experience**  
Clients rave about TrueVault’s approachability and effectiveness. Businesses can confidently manage consumer requests, with testimonials emphasizing ease of use that rivals popular tax software.

**Conclusion**  
TrueVault is more than just a privacy tool; it’s a critical partner for SMBs navigating the complicated waters of data compliance. For any company looking to safeguard consumer information while staying ahead of evolving regulations, TrueVault could very well be the answer.

For more information, visit [TrueVault](https://www.truevault.com).
